nodes.text: Tafasheel Arkan was a Jedi Knight who served the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. Arkan, along with seven other Jedi, was stationed on the planet Falleen in the year 22 BBY. During that time, the Confederate General Grievous attacked the planet and destroyed the Republic forces stationed there. All of the Jedi, including Arkan, were killed during the battle.
Tafasheel Arkan was first mentioned in The Clone Wars: Wild Space, a 2008 novel that was written by Karen Miller.
